courses.title: Introduction to Classical Music
courses.description: A comprehensive course that introduces you to the fundamentals of classical music.

courses.title: Mastering the Guitar
courses.description: Learn how to play the guitar from scratch and master advanced techniques.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Explore the art of jazz improvisation with practical exercises and expert guidance.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: A beginner-friendly course that teaches you how to play the piano step-by-step.

courses.title: Advanced Violin Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your violin skills with advanced techniques and performance tips.

courses.title: Understanding Music Theory
courses.description: Dive deep into music theory and learn how to read and write music.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create your own electronic music tracks with professional production techniques.

courses.title: Singing Techniques for All Levels
courses.description: Improve your singing voice with exercises and techniques for all skill levels.

courses.title: Percussion Masterclass
courses.description: Learn to play various percussion instruments with this comprehensive masterclass.

courses.title: History of Rock Music
courses.description: Explore the history and evolution of rock music from its roots to modern-day.
